coffees.title: Grind House Blend
coffees.description: Not for me - mostly bitter and flat no matter how I pulled it.

coffees.title: Colombia Excelso Huila (Dark)
coffees.description: Solid everyday espresso. Flavour Notes: Chocolate, Caramel, Red Fruits.

coffees.title: Decaf Central American Blend
coffees.description: My go-to decaf. Keeps the natural crema and sweetness so it doesn't feel like a downgrade late at night. I prefer the CO2 process to the water process since I feel the coffee retains more flavour.
